GeneDef.label: mutating
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have bodies that are constantly changing and mutating. They will randomly acquire fleshbeast mutations over time, and their existing mutations may change form.

GeneDef.label: mutant regeneration
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a limited ability to regenerate lost limbs, in the form of boneless tentacle-like extremeties.

GeneDef.label: detachable limbs
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have bizarre semi-sentient neural structures and tourniquet-like muscles in their limbs. This allows them to deliberately detach their natural appendages, forming friendly fingerspikes to attack enemies.

GeneDef.label: mutagenic touch
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene constantly produce tumour-like growths in the palms of their hands, which can be implanted into hosts to cause radical anatomical changes.

GeneDef.label: body quills
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene grow several sharp bioferrous quills from the torso, which protect them from harm. The quills can also be flung at enemies, but take time to regenerate.

GeneDef.label: flesh burster
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have bizarre semi-sentient neural structures throughout their bodies. Upon death, their flesh will tear itself apart, forming friendly fleshbeasts to seek retribution.
